blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Developer Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad helps developers understand how Dynatrace can provide context-aware signals and actionable insights into their applications. It brings together key resources—such as API documentation, integration guides, and practical examples—into one place. Developers can use it to learn how to instrument code, capture meaningful telemetry, and leverage Dynatrace for debugging and performance optimization. The aim is to make it easier to adopt observability practices, reduce troubleshooting time, and support building reliable, securable applications.

You can view the following documentation to learn how to [Dynatrace for Developers](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/developer-observability-overview)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

blocks.content:
# Explore Official Dynatrace Documentation for Developer Tools

Unlock the full potential of Dynatrace by exploring its comprehensive documentation. Here's a quick guide to key resources and tools available for developers:

1. **[Ingest Data](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/ingest-data-from)**  
   Discover multiple methods to ingest telemetry signals into Dynatrace, including **OneAgent**, **OpenTelemetry**, and **API calls**. Leverage **Workflows** and **Extensions** to streamline data collection.

2. **[Visualize & Manipulate Data](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/dashboards-and-notebooks#dashboards-and-notebooks)**  
   Learn how to use **Dashboards** and **Notebooks** to effectively visualize and manipulate your monitoring data in Dynatrace.

3. **[Automate Actions with Workflows](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/workflows)**  
   Discover how to automate actions on monitoring data using **Workflows**, a powerful tool for streamlining responses to critical issues and events.

4. **[Database Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/databases-app)**  
   Get a comprehensive overview of your **database landscape** in Dynatrace to identify inefficiencies and optimize performance.

5. **[Services](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/services-app)**  
   Explore the **Services app** to identify bottlenecks and uncover opportunities for proactive performance improvements.

6. **[Problems and Davis AI](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/davis-ai-problems-app)**  
   Learn how to interpret **problem cards** and leverage **Davis AI** to identify root causes and troubleshoot issues effectively.

7. **[Profiling and Optimization](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/profiling-optimization)**  
   Access **CPU profiling** tools and learn how to drill down to specific methods causing CPU spikes to optimize application performance.

8. **[Frontend Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/digital-experience)**  
   Gain insights into **Digital Experience Monitoring** and learn how to monitor and improve your frontend applications with Dynatrace.

9. **[Problem Notifications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/upgrade-guide-alert-notification)**  
   Set up **workflows** to automatically send problem notifications to tools like **ServiceNow**, **PagerDuty**, **Slack**, or email to ensure timely responses to critical incidents.

content.title: OpenPipeline
content.description: Ingest large data into Dynatrace using openPipeline.

blocks.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
